remarks: The Axiom of Regularity using abbreviations.  Axiom 6 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 21.  This is called the "weak form."  There is also a "strong form," not requiring that ` A ` be a set, that can be proved with more difficulty (see ~ zfregs ).  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-1995.)

zfreg.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
zfreg $p |- ( A =/= (/) -> E. x e. A ( x i^i A ) = (/) ) $.
$d A x $.
